name: Jordan Lee
persona: Jordan Lee is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who has faced some academic challenges, reflected in a CGPA of 2.69. While Jordan is moderately motivated to achieve higher grades and shows perseverance, struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety sometimes impact performance. Jordan believes improvement is possible and is working to develop better study habits and manage stress. With continued effort and support, Jordan hopes to raise their grades and gain more confidence in their academic abilities.
